elements.title: hyalospheniid amoebae (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that many hyalospheniid amoebae (example pictured) construct shells by stealing mineralized particles from the shells of their prey?

elements.title: Helen O'Brien (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Romanian-born Helen O'Brien escaped advancing Russians on the King's horse, opened Eve, and worked as a spy for MI5 and MI6?

elements.title: Conversations about Important Things (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that students who do not attend Conversations about Important Things lessons face expulsion or police investigation?

elements.title: Dan Blumenthal (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Dan Blumenthal, a senior defense official in the Bush administration, believes that China has "three roads" to gain control of Taiwan?

elements.title: city council of Palembang, Indonesia (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the building housing the city council of Palembang, Indonesia, was claimed to be the "grandest" of its kind?

elements.title: Stan Mataele (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Stan Mataele lied about his football experience but still became one of the top players in the state?

elements.title: The Constellation of Leo (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that The Constellation of Leo, a group portrait of people from Italy's art world, was exhibited with a note that read "not without a trace of irony"?

elements.title: does not know (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Mariah Carey does not know Jennifer Lopez?
